website_summaries.verdict: Not ideal if you need to make a lot of snow cones fast, but it's a reasonably-priced choice considering the accessories and quiet operation.
pros: A basic machine with a streamlined design that comes with 3 syrups, cones, and straws
Easy to use and quieter to operate than most
cons: Small capacity requires you to continually feed it ice
Those who prefer fine "shaved" ice may be disappointed with the grainy texture it produces

customer_reviews.title: This is a real deal snow cone machine adults beware ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a real deal snow cone machine adults beware you may use it more than the kids do. I am highly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mrray

customer_reviews.title: Makes ice chips not snow ice!
customer_reviews.text: This item makes ice chips not snow ice. The term snow cone implies that the ice will be cut down to snow like quality. This item makes small ice chips which means you have to chew the ice not let it slowly melt in your mouth like snow. I was so disappointed in this product. Plus upon delivery one the syrups had leaked all over the item box and delivery box. Syrup was shipped upside down opposite the ice machine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Leaky sticky mess
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write many negative reviews but it’s very frustrating when you buy this bundle purely because it comes with the syrup but each bottle comes leaking in the package... just as other reviews have mentioned.. I should have listened. This wasn’t a shipping problems but more of a packaging design issue. Also, the machine makes more of a crushed ice rather than snow.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T

customer_reviews.title: The machine was good but the shipping was not syrups we’re packed to ...
customer_reviews.text: The machine was good but the shipping was not syrups we’re packed to tight and one bottle leaked luckeit wS inside a second wrapper
customer_reviews.author: Karen sickler

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: The seller went out of their way to make sure this was delivered before Christmas. As a result, we had a very happy little 5 year old on Christmas day as this was one of the main things she asked for. It came very well packaged. It works great and makes delicious snow cones. I'm very happy I purchased this item from this company.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: So fun and great set
customer_reviews.text: my grandson LOVES this as does whole family. would be great family gift and comes with everything needed to use right away.A WINNER ..
customer_reviews.author: rubya

customer_reviews.title: small but does the job easlly
customer_reviews.text: this was given to a 10 yr> old boy for his birthday he loved it !! almost as much as the adults who got in line with the kids for their snow cone. everything you need comes with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: susan rebideau

customer_reviews.title: Big Power, Little Package
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for our daughters birthday party, and it worked beautifully over and over. It grinds the ice efficiently, into a great texture for perfect snow cones.
customer_reviews.author: JTJim

customer_reviews.title: This was an awesome gift Works amazingly Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome gift Works amazingly Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes good snow cones!
customer_reviews.text: Have bought two of this product at different times for the two grand kids families. Both families and the kids love this cone maker set
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lazzara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun to use with the grandchildren!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Electrical part of it didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived, and didnt work, sent in for a return ups never picked up.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate.  My grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints here. This was a great purchase. Kids set it up and used it all summer.
customer_reviews.author: C C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, not too noisy, easy to use, kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: pickels

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great snow cone maker.. Makes them fast, Easy for a 4 year old to make...Great machine!
customer_reviews.author: sherry butler

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Initially the Blizzy worked just fine...after about two months it started to make a very loud horrific noise and then it completely stopped crushing ice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We had a family get together and everyone loved the sno-coned
customer_reviews.text: It broke the first time we used it. We had a family get together and everyone loved the sno-coned, but the motor stopped working :(
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I bought it for a girl I babysit and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee A Wellman

customer_reviews.title: Low cost, but it is a lot cheaper product ...
customer_reviews.text: Low cost, but it is a lot cheaper product than I was expecting. We’ve probably made 15 cones with it and the motor sounds Ike it’s doing now. Also th chips of ice are quite large now, perhaps the blade is dulling. I wouldn’t order this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McGuffey

customer_reviews.title: Snow cone maker works great but straws were a waste
customer_reviews.text: My nephews just opened their snow cone maker that they received from Christmas and inside their straws that came with their maker was a giant hair in the sealed wrapper. Never opened. Snow cone maker works great but straws were a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonloverforlife

customer_reviews.title: Cool treat
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son's birthday. He loved it. Not getting much use now due to cooler temperatures, but he will use it more next summer.
customer_reviews.author: robert a daniels

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: my grandson wanted a snow cone machine for Christmas. I started looking at the toy ones, like the "Snoopy" but remembered my kids had one and it wasn't very good. Found this one for a little more money and glad I did. This is made much better and really works well. I wouldn't call it commercial grade, but for kids it's great. Grinds up the cubes quickly, so you can actually make cones for a group of kids without taking forever.
customer_reviews.author: sparks

customer_reviews.title: The BEST KIT OUT THERE
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a deal! Works great, even use it 3-4 times a day. Great machine. I bought the kit and everything is better then I expected, tbh. Flavors are out of this world great. Just like back in the day.. DELICIOUS!! AND THEY ARE NOT EXPIRED!! Thank you seller. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: S.T. E.

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your Buck
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. My girls like the flavors, especially the grape. Nice that it comes with everything you need (except the ice), definitely a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: puppett13

customer_reviews.title: Worked hard all summer long.
customer_reviews.text: Best investment this summer! It is nothing fancy but did the job every single day this summer. We used sugar free water flavor shots for a little color, flavor and a whole lot less sugar for my toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: C&K

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sons birthday party and it was a hit! I’ll be breaking it out for many parties to come! *add a little rum for the mommy’s 😂
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it! Whatever makes them happy
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love it! Whatever makes them happy, makes me happy. Wish it came with a snow cone scoop, so I could fill a bowl up and have the rounded top....since it comes out from the edge, and not the middle of the shaver....it fills up the sides rather than from the middle up.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: works great with bagged ice cubes
customer_reviews.text: works great with bagged ice cubes, the ones made at home are a little big and take longer to shave down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great machine!!!! Makes a great snow cone! Grand son loves it and cleans easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great.....its been a big hit at our house this summer
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great little snowcone machine!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grand daughter who asked for a snow cone machine for Christmas. I wasn't really expecting much but the whole family was pleasantly surprised when we had delicious snow cones on Christmas night. I would suggest buying extra cone cups and syrup when you purchase the machine because they won't last long. It shaves the ice like a snow cone shack would but you can do it at home a lot cheaper. Would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Womack

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: Worked but plastic makes it seem like a 'toy.' Hope it lasts
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Y

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a grandchild. It is well made and very easy to use with barely having to read the instructions. The ice is shaved to a perfect texture. We are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn N.

customer_reviews.title: Gave this to my grandson for his birthday ( 8 ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my grandson for his birthday ( 8 yrs.) His Mom can't keep enough ice in the house now! :) It was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Marshall
